title: Worlds next year?
body: How about you give every region a spot instead of NA, EU, and Korea 3 bloody spots what's that going to show just trying to make worlds longer. How about give every region a spot so the BEST team in each region a spot in worlds so they can atlas give a chance. i know this takes away that wild card but this is saying that these little regions aren't good enough or large enough to compete in worlds. i see this in oce by having the least queues up at the same time compared to NA and EU
